pullRequest.body:
These notions on functors are now `Functor.Full`, `Functor.Faithful`, `Functor.EssSurj`, `Functor.IsEquivalence`, `Functor.ReflectsIsomorphisms`. Deprecated aliases are introduced for the previous names.
